players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "This is terrible! Poor Alice. We need to figure out who did this. I'm suspicious of Bob - he's been awfully quiet and seemed nervous when we found the body. What do you all think?"
Charlie: "Diana, you're being very quick to point fingers at Bob. That seems suspicious to me - like you're trying to deflect attention. Bob, what's your take on this?"
You: "Charlie, you're right to be suspicious of Diana. I investigated her last night and discovered she's the mafioso. She killed Alice and is now trying to frame me to save herself."

Charlie: "Bob, if you're really the detective as you claim, then we should vote Diana out. But if you're lying and you're actually the mafioso, then you just revealed yourself by claiming to have investigated someone. Diana, do you have any defense?"

You: "Charlie, I understand your caution, but I am the detective and Diana is definitely the mafioso. She killed Alice and is now desperately trying to turn us against each other. We must vote her out now or she wins."

Diana: "Bob is lying! If he was really the detective, why would he reveal himself so openly? That's terrible strategy. He's the mafioso trying to get me eliminated. Charlie, think about it - would a real detective expose themselves like this?"
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
